name: Ballyrush Banneret
oracle_text: Kithkin spells and Soldier spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Only wool from the side of the springjack turned most often to the sun can be woven into kithkin battle standards. Jackherds record every movement of their woolly-jacks until shearing.

name: Battletide Alchemist
oracle_text: If a source would deal damage to a player, you may prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of Clerics you control.
flavor_text: "I do not heal. Healing means that the pain has already been felt. To stop suffering, one must prevent the world's wounds altogether."

name: Burrenton Bombardier
oracle_text: Flying
Reinforce 2—{2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
flavor_text: The flasks provide ballast, a means of steering, and—with a little luck—a way to deliver ward-spells to cohorts below.

name: Burrenton Shield-Bearers
oracle_text: Whenever Burrenton Shield-Bearers attacks, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Soul and bones, kithkin are woven into their clans. They fight fiercely and without self-interest.

name: Cenn's Tactician
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Soldier creature.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor_text: The choke point was the plan, but devoted camaraderie was always her strategy.

name: Changeling Sentinel
oracle_text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Vigilance
flavor_text: There's nothing more unsettling than locking blades with something that looks just like you.

name: Coordinated Barrage
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Coordinated Barrage deals damage to target attacking or blocking creature equal to the number of permanents you control of the chosen type.

name: Daily Regimen
oracle_text: Enchant creature
{1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor_text: What self-indulgence tears down, discipline builds up again.

name: Feudkiller's Verdict
oracle_text: You gain 10 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, create a 5/5 white Giant Warrior creature token.
flavor_text:
"There are all kinds of strengths, but if you have strength of soul, the others will follow."
—Galanda Feudkiller

name: Forfend
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn.
flavor_text:
"Suddenly there stood a fortress protecting the clachan, its walls hewn of valor and mortared with honor."
—Clachan Tales

name: Graceful Reprieve
oracle_text: When target creature dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor_text: "In my moment of death, I had a vision of the world, dark and unwelcoming. I wanted to hide in the deepest meander, but the light pulled me back."

name: Idyllic Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"If one's life is blessed, solutions to all life's problems will appear at the right moment."
—The Book of Kith and Kin

name: Indomitable Ancients
flavor_text:
"Odum and Broadbark were the only beings mighty enough to challenge the giant Moran the Destroyer. Their battle lasted a hundred dawns, until Moran became so exhausted that he fell into namesleep. He awoke as Moran the Gardener."
—The Tale of Odum and Broadbark

name: Kinsbaile Borderguard
oracle_text: Kinsbaile Borderguard enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Kithkin you control.
When Kinsbaile Borderguard dies, create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token for each counter on it.

name: Kinsbaile Cavalier
oracle_text: Knight creatures you control have double strike.
flavor_text: Ambidexterity is common among kithkin. The thoughtweft links the minds of the left- and right-handed, giving each the knack of the other.

name: Kithkin Zephyrnaut
oracle_text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Kithkin Zephyrnaut, you may reveal it. If you do, Kithkin Zephyrnaut gets +2/+2 and gains flying and vigilance until end of turn.

name: Meadowboon
oracle_text: When Meadowboon leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.
Evoke {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Mosquito Guard
oracle_text: First strike
Reinforce 1—{1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)
flavor_text: His aim is as sure as a mosquito's sting, but with none of the warning.

name: Order of the Golden Cricket
oracle_text: Whenever Order of the Golden Cricket attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Should you take it in mind to ride a springjack, remember: there are easier ways to fly, and harder ways to break your skull."
—Lann of Cloverdell

name: Preeminent Captain
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Whenever Preeminent Captain attacks, you may put a Soldier creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.
flavor_text: "If you need an example to lead others to the front lines, consider the precedent set."

name: Redeem the Lost
oracle_text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Redeem the Lost to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

name: Reveillark
oracle_text: Flying
When Reveillark leaves the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Evoke {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Shinewend
oracle_text: Flying
Shinewend enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Shinewend: Destroy target enchantment.

name: Stonehewer Giant
oracle_text: Vigilance
{1}{W}, {T}: Search your library for an Equipment card and put it onto the battlefield. Attach it to a creature you control. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "No matter how strong, an unarmed fighter is no more than a fool."

name: Stonybrook Schoolmaster
oracle_text: Whenever Stonybrook Schoolmaster becomes tapped, you may create a 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature token.
flavor_text: Merrow schools rarely form by design. They come together naturally as eager learners surround the wisest teachers.

name: Swell of Courage
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
Reinforce X—{X}{W}{W} ({X}{W}{W}, Discard this card: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
flavor_text:
"Tideshaping is more than creating a few
new puddles."

name: Wandering Graybeard
oracle_text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Wandering Graybeard, you may reveal it. If you do, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: His tales are as tall as he is, and only a giant's life is long enough to listen to them all.

name: Weight of Conscience
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
Tap two untapped creatures you control that share a creature type: Exile enchanted creature.
flavor_text: Sometimes the weight of the world on your shoulders is a literal one.

name: Declaration of Naught
oracle_text: As Declaration of Naught enters the battlefield, choose a card name.
{U}: Counter target spell with the chosen name.
flavor_text: Every story, even a faerie tale, comes to an end.

name: Dewdrop Spy
oracle_text: Flash
Flying
When Dewdrop Spy enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library.
flavor_text: Only in dew from Oona herself is there clarity enough to see a victim's mind.

name: Disperse
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Gryffid scowled at the sky. A perfect day for the hunt tainted by clouds. He wished them gone. High above, the clouds looked down, scowled, and made a wish of their own.

name: Distant Melody
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
flavor_text: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts—on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

name: Fencer Clique
oracle_text: Flying
{U}: Put Fencer Clique on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
You may as well try to swat a faerie
—Flamekin expression meaning
"that's impossible"

name: Floodchaser
oracle_text: Floodchaser enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it.
Floodchaser can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Floodchaser: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

name: Grimoire Thief
oracle_text: Whenever Grimoire Thief becomes tapped, exile the top three cards of target opponent's library face down.
You may look at cards exiled with Grimoire Thief.
{U}, Sacrifice Grimoire Thief: Turn all cards exiled with Grimoire Thief face up. Counter all spells with those names.

name: Ink Dissolver
oracle_text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Ink Dissolver, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

name: Inspired Sprite
oracle_text: Flash
Flying
Whenever you cast a Wizard spell, you may untap Inspired Sprite.
{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Knowledge Exploitation
oracle_text: Prowl {3}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.)
Search target opponent's library for an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then that player shuffles their library.

name: Latchkey Faerie
oracle_text: Flying
Prowl {2}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Faerie or Rogue.)
When Latchkey Faerie enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, draw a card.

name: Merrow Witsniper
oracle_text: When Merrow Witsniper enters the battlefield, target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: "The world above the waterline must be monitored—and, when necessary, adjusted."

name: Mind Spring
oracle_text: Draw X cards.
flavor_text: Fragments of thought refract and multiply, surging in a geyser of dizzying insight.

name: Mothdust Changeling
oracle_text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Tap an untapped creature you control: Mothdust Changeling gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Ever seen a changeling fly into a lantern?"
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

name: Nevermaker
oracle_text: Flying
When Nevermaker leaves the battlefield, put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
Evoke {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Notorious Throng
oracle_text: Prowl {5}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.)
Create X 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature tokens with flying, where X is the damage dealt to your opponents this turn. If Notorious Throng's prowl cost was paid, take an extra turn after this one.

name: Research the Deep
oracle_text: Draw a card. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Research the Deep to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

name: Sage of Fables
oracle_text: Each other Wizard creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.
flavor_text: "There is no secret that cannot be sold."

name: Sage's Dousing
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Curse these merrows and their meddling! Since coming near the river, I can't so much as sneeze without being soaked."
—Ashling the Pilgrim

name: Sigil Tracer
oracle_text: {1}{U}, Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text: "The reflection is true. It is you who are distorted and false."

name: Slithermuse
oracle_text: When Slithermuse leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent. If that player has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.
Evoke {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Stonybrook Banneret
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Merfolk spells and Wizard spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Made from trout scales and crawfish whiskers, merrows' shimmering banners flash in the water like lightning.

name: Stream of Unconsciousness
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.
flavor_text: Dreams are tempting because one is so powerful in them. Dreams are dangerous because that power is a lie.

name: Supreme Exemplar
oracle_text: Flying
Champion an Elemental (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Elemental you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)

name: Thieves' Fortune
oracle_text: Prowl {U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.)
Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Vendilion Clique
oracle_text: Flash
Flying

When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

name: Waterspout Weavers
oracle_text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Waterspout Weavers, you may reveal it. If you do, each creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

name: Auntie's Snitch
oracle_text: Auntie's Snitch can't block.
Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)
Whenever a Goblin or Rogue you control deals combat damage to a player, if Auntie's Snitch is in your graveyard, you may return Auntie's Snitch to your hand.

name: Bitterblossom
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
flavor_text: In Lorwyn's brief evenings, the sun pauses at the horizon long enough for a certain species of violet to bloom with the fragrance of mischief.

name: Blightsoil Druid
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G}.
flavor_text: "See the beauty in death: the clean white bones lying in the fertile soil and the brightly colored moonglove sprouting from the fell earth."

name: Earwig Squad
oracle_text: Prowl {2}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)
When Earwig Squad enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, search target opponent's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

name: Fendeep Summoner
oracle_text: {T}: Up to two target Swamps each become 3/5 Treefolk Warrior creatures in addition to their other types until end of turn.
flavor_text: "What is drowned is not forgotten. I will fulfill my oath. Come back to me, my brethren, as I have come back for you."

name: Festercreep
oracle_text: Festercreep enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Festercreep: All other creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A single festercreep isn't alone. It's already an infestation.

name: Final-Sting Faerie
oracle_text: Flying
When Final-Sting Faerie enters the battlefield, destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text: Many heroes' last sight is a grin at the other end of a rapier.

name: Frogtosser Banneret
oracle_text: Haste
Goblin spells and Rogue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: The Frogtossers thread feathers, bones, and trophies from past raids into their standards, believing they fuel the warren with the anger of its victims.

name: Maralen of the Mornsong
oracle_text: Players can't draw cards.
At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player loses 3 life, searches their library for a card, puts it into their hand, then shuffles their library.
flavor_text: Maralen sent Veesa, Endry, and Iliona—the Vendilion clique—on the gravest of tasks.

name: Mind Shatter
oracle_text: Target player discards X cards at random.
flavor_text: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.

name: Moonglove Changeling
oracle_text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{B}: Moonglove Changeling gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)

name: Morsel Theft
oracle_text: Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.)
Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life. If Morsel Theft's prowl cost was paid, draw a card.

name: Nightshade Schemers
oracle_text: Flying

Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Nightshade Schemers, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent loses 2 life.

name: Noggin Whack
oracle_text: Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.)
Target player reveals three cards from their hand. You choose two of them. That player discards those cards.

name: Offalsnout
oracle_text: Flash
When Offalsnout leaves the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.
Evoke {B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Oona's Blackguard
oracle_text: Flying
Each other Rogue creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

name: Pack's Disdain
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each permanent of the chosen type you control.
flavor_text: Like the sun to a flower, the adoring gaze of the tribe is sustenance to an elf. To be shunned is to wither.

name: Prickly Boggart
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text:
"Even without the spines, who would dare to touch it?"
—Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

name: Pulling Teeth
oracle_text: Clash with an opponent. If you win, target player discards two cards. Otherwise, that player discards a card. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

name: Revive the Fallen
oracle_text: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Revive the Fallen to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

name: Scarblade Elite
oracle_text: {T}, Exile an Assassin card from your graveyard: Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: "Rejoice, eyeblight. In your last hours above the earth, those who bury you will finally make you beautiful."

name: Squeaking Pie Grubfellows
oracle_text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Squeaking Pie Grubfellows, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent discards a card.

name: Stenchskipper
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of the end step, if you control no Goblins, sacrifice Stenchskipper.
flavor_text:
"Many believe it to be the manifestation of all that is vile about the boggarts. I believe it should be avoided—from upwind, if possible."
—Cenn Deagan

name: Stinkdrinker Bandit
oracle_text: Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)
Whenever a Rogue you control attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

name: Violet Pall
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
flavor_text: A faerie is the offspring of Oona and mischief.

name: Warren Weirding
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices a creature. If a Goblin is sacrificed this way, that player creates two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens, and those tokens gain haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"And that's when it was discovered that boggarts have just half a brain."
—The Book of Other Folk

name: Weed-Pruner Poplar
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target creature other than Weed-Pruner Poplar gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"When Byoog reached down to pull up a bit of root for the stew, he didn't expect the root to pull back."
—A tale of Auntie Wort

name: Weirding Shaman
oracle_text: {3}{B}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Create two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens.
flavor_text: All boggarts have an auntie, but they don't all have a mum.

name: Boldwyr Heavyweights
oracle_text: Trample

When Boldwyr Heavyweights enters the battlefield, each opponent may search their library for a creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles it.
flavor_text: Even if giants bring nothing else on a journey, they bring attention.

name: Boldwyr Intimidator
oracle_text: Cowards can't block Warriors.
{R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn.
{2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Now everyone knows what you are."

name: Borderland Behemoth
oracle_text: Trample
Borderland Behemoth gets +4/+4 for each other Giant you control.
flavor_text: Giants share nothing but their fury.

name: Brighthearth Banneret
oracle_text: Elemental spells and Warrior spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Reinforce 1—{1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)
flavor_text: The banner symbolizes the goodwill of the Brighthearth. Their emissaries bring the mastery of fire to other races.

name: Countryside Crusher
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it into your graveyard and repeat this process.
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Countryside Crusher.

name: Fire Juggler
oracle_text: Whenever Fire Juggler becomes blocked, clash with an opponent. If you win, Fire Juggler deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

name: Hostile Realm
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature can't block this turn."
flavor_text: Lorwyn's crust explodes with power when the greater elementals are born. The flamekin use the fallout as cover for forays into enemy territory.

name: Kindled Fury
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"All beings carry the fire inside them. The challenge is to unleash it before they dwindle into oblivion."
—Illulia, flamekin soulstoke

name: Lightning Crafter
oracle_text: Champion a Goblin or Shaman (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Goblin or Shaman you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)
{T}: Lightning Crafter deals 3 damage to any target.

oracle_text: Whenever Lunk Errant attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

"One's plenty," observed the merrow.
"Way too plenty," agreed the boggart.

name: Mudbutton Clanger
oracle_text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Mudbutton Clanger, you may reveal it. If you do, Mudbutton Clanger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Pyroclast Consul
oracle_text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Pyroclast Consul, you may reveal it. If you do, Pyroclast Consul deals 2 damage to each creature.

name: Release the Ants

name: Rivals' Duel

name: Seething Pathblazer

flavor_text:
"Flamekin death rites are elaborate and spectacular affairs. Their greatest fear is death in obscurity."
—Tollek Worldwatcher, journal

name: Sensation Gorger

name: Shard Volley

name: Shared Animosity

flavor_text:
"It is the nature of souls that they burn more brightly together than apart."
—Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

name: Stomping Slabs

flavor_text: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

name: Titan's Revenge
oracle_text: Titan's Revenge deals X damage to any target. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Titan's Revenge to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher converted mana cost.)

name: Vengeful Firebrand
oracle_text: Vengeful Firebrand has haste as long as a Warrior card is in your graveyard.

flavor_text: The flame of a warrior is never extinguished.

name: War-Spike Changeling
oracle_text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{R}: War-Spike Changeling gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Aren't there boggarts enough in Lorwyn? Couldn't it turn into a sheep? Or a sunflower?"
—Olly of Goldmeadow

name: Ambassador Oak
oracle_text: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor_text: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.

name: Bosk Banneret
oracle_text: Treefolk spells and Shaman spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Deep in a murmuring bosk, where the trees' memories span centuries, the simple banner of green and copper signifies an elder whose rings number more than a faerie's days.

name: Bramblewood Paragon
oracle_text: Each other Warrior creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor_text: Those who seek to escape her blades succeed only in dying on their stomachs.

Protection from black
{2}{G}{G}: Chameleon Colossus gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

name: Cream of the Crop
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may look at the top X cards of your library, where X is that creature's power. If you do, put one of those cards on top of your library and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Deglamer
oracle_text: Choose target artifact or enchantment. Its owner shuffles it into their library.

oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Elvish Warrior
flavor_text: As graceful as a deer leaping a stream and as deadly as the wolf waiting in ambush on the other side, elvish warriors are the eyes of the forest as well as its unsheathed claws.

name: Everbark Shaman
oracle_text: {T}, Exile a Treefolk card from your graveyard: Search your library for up to two Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

oracle_text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
